Reference

OpenServer functions

Essential functionality

DoCmd()

Send an OpenServer command

DoGet()

Get a value from an OpenServer variable

DoSet()

Set a value to an OpenServer variable

DoSlowCmd()

Send a command with a delay

DoGAPFunc()

Run a GAP function

Utilities

Utility functions

rDoGet()

Function that converts OpenServer raw vectors to R vectors

openserver_to_character()

Convert from OpenServer text object to character

openserver_to_double()

Convert from OpenServer text object to double

openserver_to_integer()

Convert from OpenServer text object to integer

openserver_to_date()

Convert from OpenServer text object to date
